FILE_WRITTEN:src/build_pipeline/schema_validation.py
DIR_STATE:["src/build_pipeline/__init__.py", "src/build_pipeline/cli.py", "src/build_pipeline/schema_validation.py"]
SUMMARY:Implemented a fail-fast schema validation module that loads JSON schemas, validates input JSON files with structured results, and falls back to a minimal validator if jsonschema is unavailable.
